title: Ticket #7266: Create wiki page for "Jupyter anchor" recipe
description:
We should write a Wiki page based on DESY's configuration for quickly matching Jupyter jobs to dedicated resources, so that we can have a recipe for a "Jupyter anchor" node admins could drop into their pools.

(A Docker image or file would be nice, too.)

Initially, this recipe will be a central manager and schedd dedicated to Jupyter. This adds complexity and slowness. We'd like to switch to a model based on the schedd allowing claim reuse based on accounting group, along with long-term holding of claimed (but idle) slots in order to reserve them for jobs which require fast starts. See #7265.
